refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkNotebook widget is a GtkContainer whose children are pages that can be switched between using tab labels along one edge.

There are many configuration options for GtkNotebook. Among other things, you can choose on which edge the tabs appear (see gtk_notebook_set_tab_pos()), whether, if there are too many tabs to fit the noteobook should be made bigger or scrolling arrows added (see gtk_notebook_set_scrollable), and whether there will be a popup menu allowing the users to switch pages. (see gtk_notebook_enable_popup(), gtk_noteobook_disable_popup())

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook

refsect2.title: The "enable-popup" property
refsect2.para: If TRUE, pressing the right mouse button on the notebook pops up a menu that you can use to go to a page.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "homogeneous" property
refsect2.para: Whether tabs should have homogeneous sizes.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "page" property
refsect2.para: The index of the current page.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "scrollable" property
refsect2.para: If TRUE, scroll arrows are added if there are too many tabs to fit.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "show-border" property
refsect2.para: Whether the border should be shown or not.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "show-tabs" property
refsect2.para: Whether tabs should be shown or not.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "tab-border" property
refsect2.para: Width of the border around the tab labels.
Default value: 2

refsect2.title: The "tab-hborder" property
refsect2.para: Width of the horizontal border of tab labels.
Default value: 2

refsect2.title: The "tab-pos" property
refsect2.para: Which side of the notebook holds the tabs.
Default value: GTK_POS_TOP

refsect2.title: The "tab-vborder" property
refsect2.para: Width of the vertical border of tab labels.
Default value: 2

refsect2.title: The "menu-label" child property
refsect2.para: The string displayed in the child's menu entry.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "position" child property
refsect2.para: The index of the child in the parent.
Allowed values: >= -1
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "tab-expand" child property
refsect2.para: Whether to expand the child's tab or not.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "tab-fill" child property
refsect2.para: Whether the child's tab should fill the allocated area or not.
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The "tab-label" child property
refsect2.para: The string displayed on the child's tab label.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "tab-pack" child property
refsect2.para: A GtkPackType indicating whether the child is packed with reference to the start or end of the parent.
Default value: GTK_PACK_START

refsect2.title: The "has-backward-stepper" style property
refsect2.para: The "has-backward-stepper" property determines whether the standard backward arrow button is displayed.
Default value: TRUE
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: The "has-forward-stepper" style property
refsect2.para: The "has-forward-stepper" property determines whether the standard forward arrow button is displayed.
Default value: TRUE
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: The "has-secondary-backward-stepper" style property
refsect2.para: The "has-secondary-backward-stepper" property determines whether a second backward arrow button is displayed on the opposite end of the tab area.
Default value: FALSE
Since 2.4

refsect2.title: The "has-secondary-forward-stepper" style property
refsect2.para: The "has-secondary-forward-stepper" property determines whether a second forward arrow button is displayed on the opposite end of the tab area.
Default value: FALSE
Since 2.4
